website_summaries.verdict: This grass-fed vanilla whey protein powder has 24 grams of protein per serving, and 2 billion CFU probiotics for optimal gut health.
pros: No gluten, soy, antibiotics, or added sugars, rBST-free
cons: Can separate after sitting, which is common for these types of powders

customer_reviews.title: NO MIGRAINES!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from MIGRAINES with AURORAS. Any time I eat dairy, avocado, chocolate, or any food with XANTHAN GUM, or GUAR GUM. I get a massive migraine, yes, with vomiting included. Definitely toxic, definitely an alergy. Horrible. I've had the plant based protein and it works great also. However, I wanted whey isolate protein since it's preferable when having any type of work out regimen for muscle growth and recovery. I FOUND THE PERFECT FIT! NO MIGRAINES, NO NOT ONE. I'm on my fourth purchase of this product, and I definitely RECO for anyone that suffers from MIGRAINES. Hope you find the right fit for you. Consider it.
customer_reviews.author: Cult Of Personality Czar 🇺🇸

customer_reviews.title: Best protein source out there
customer_reviews.text: I've tried vanilla and chocolate, and I actually prefer vanilla much more, and so does my husband. The flavoring is the best I've tried, and I've tried probably about 15 protein powders. It's important for me to have grass fed whey protein because if the cows are fed grains, it's not clean. I like that it's sweetened with erythritol, which is also a clean sweetener that tastes WAY better than just straight up stevia alone. The macros on this are great, low carb, no fat, and high protein.
customer_reviews.author: GoVols

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mix and not gritty
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the one who drinks this protein. He loves the grass fed whey over the plant based. Ive tasted it as well and it is very smooth and not gritty whatsoever. It mixes well with almond milk and water. He also puts it in his overnight oats for additional protein and it absorbs well in the oats and you can't even tell there is protein powder in it. Highly recommend if you're looking for a grass fed whey protein that mixes well and is not gritty and has great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: jenw

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to BB Performance Recover and great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this looking for a replacement for my Beachbody performance recover, something with protein and BCAAs. I love the taste of this, it's a smooth milk chocolate taste. It might not mix as well as some other protein powders I've had but there difference is very slight, not worth taking away a star. I don't review often but I would recommend this product. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder is delicious! I'm very picky when it comes to a good quality protein powder that tastes good. This powder is not very sweet which is what I like. It says to mix one scoop with 8oz of water, but I think that's too much liquid so I do half almond milk half water, add in some ice and maybe some spinach and it's a great post-workout drink. I believe it is well worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lori923

customer_reviews.title: horrible protein
customer_reviews.text: So... i use to buy this really cheap protein back in the day like a huge bag for like 20 bucks it was the absolute worst for your body i found out later on, it made me feel like crap ... this protein taste just like it and it makes me feel just like it i really think they are selling fake protein powder or very low quality powder its absolutely disgusting, and its made me feel sick like i had some maybe 5 hours ago and my stomach still feels weird. Never ever buying this product again or would recommend to anyone dont take this. If i could id give it no stars.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Ortega

customer_reviews.title: The perfect protein shake
customer_reviews.text: I knew I would love this product there is nothing that this company has made that I do not approve of. I love the smell of the vanilla as soon as you open the canister lid the smell of vanilla is so strong and good and it tastes so good. I thought it would have an aftertaste because it has the stevia in it but there is no aftertaste I enjoy drinking it for the first time in my life I have literally enjoyed drinking a shape that I make at home finally oh I am definitely sticking with this and my husband loves it too
customer_reviews.author: VENOMnVIPER

customer_reviews.title: Seriously the best tasting protein shake I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I've probably tried 30-40 different brands of protein shakes over the past 30 years. The ones with the best ingredients normally have at least a bit of that "vitamin" taste - or they're gritty - or watery... I was pleasantly surprised when I tasted this one. Absolutely delicious! I love the clean, quality ingredients. Plain or with some of my garden fresh berries it makes a delicious, quick breakfast or snack.
customer_reviews.author: S.Burns

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: It's always hard to find quality and good tasting whey. I love that it's Certified Grass Fed Clean Whey and Protein Isolate. Has not bothered my stomach at all! Dissolved super easy. Smells good. I've tried with 6oz, 8oz and 12 oz of water for 1 scoop and they each are good, just depends on what flavor you enjoy. I've only used it in a shaker cup which has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: El Pescador

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product!! I was a little afraid to order because I saw the reviews about flavor, but decided to give it a try after my doctor strongly recommended this brand. I got the chocolate one and I think it tastes amazing with vanilla almond milk. I’m very happy with it. I’m about to order my second bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: I've been using the old version for around 3-4 years and it was awesome. This new one
customer_reviews.text: Ok, steer away from this new version!! I've been using the old version for around 3-4 years and it was awesome. This new one is absolutely horrible ... the new creamy version they tout is more like sludge in your cup and the taste it not good ...! Did they even taste this to the public before they decided to change the whole formulate on their own. NEVER buying again. Why did you screw up a good thing??? should have kept it the same.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Miller

customer_reviews.title: the best protein powder!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!!! I'm so glad I found it. I needed a powder that had more lysine than Arginine, which is harder to find than you think.. but still be non-gmo, plant based, etc. this is the best protein powder I've ever tried and I will continue to use this until they stop making it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but does weird in my shakes
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't taste bad, not very sweet if that's important to you. The main problem that I have is it seems to expand in my shakes. Using the same ingredients as with my previous (much more expensive) powder, It completely fills my cup after blending and has kind of a whipped texture. This texture will not suspend my chia and flax so it sinks to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Beakfast Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: This is my base ingredient for a healthy bfast shake. I usually add a full heaping scoop to 1 T nuts, a 1/2c fruit, almond milk 1/2c, coconut milk 1/2c, 1T finely ground chia seed, 1 T monkfruit sugar
customer_reviews.author: Kate Knight

customer_reviews.title: Not a great chocolate taste
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a low review because I did not like the taste. It says chocolate but it has more of a coconut flavor. I’m not a big fan of coconut so that’s why I don’t truly enjoy the taste. The texture is fine however I will not be buying this again strictly because of the taste.
customer_reviews.author: linda albergo

customer_reviews.title: Tastes amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this tastes in smoothies! By itself, just mixing in a shaker bottle also tastes just as good. I love the way it makes smoothies fluffy though and gives it just enough sweetness. Since they got bought out by Nestle can not comment about ingredients since I have not done my research on that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dida

customer_reviews.title: The brand itself is highly recommended but the chocolate flavored version of the grass fed ...
customer_reviews.text: The brand itself is highly recommended but the chocolate flavored version of the grass fed whey series is kind of "so so". Either stick to vanilla flavor or prefer plant based protein series of the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tasdemirc

customer_reviews.title: It tastes so gross
customer_reviews.text: It tastes so gross, I can't drink it! Wasted it! I bought the chocolate one. It's disgusting tasting.
customer_reviews.author: Anela

customer_reviews.title: Really Delicious! Thank you
customer_reviews.text: DELICIOUS! I added some unsweetened almond/nut milk and vitamixed it with some ice. I'm pretty sure this will taste awesome with just water and a shaker bottle too. Love how delicious and wonderful ingredients it has with nothing in it that I don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting protein drink
customer_reviews.text: I think this tastes great. You do have to keep shaking it to keep it mixed. But i feel thats an okay tradeoff for having the great vanilla taste and health benefits. I haven't tried the chocolate. I was told it wasn't all that good so I'll pass on the chocolate and continue ordering the vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: suzie

customer_reviews.title: Best Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great protein supplement... the best part is that the ingredients are one of the highest quality and best in class. Just amazing that there is no bs or any sort of questionable additives. The taste is good... I mix it with almond milk to get a more creamy flavor because i like to add it with more liquid than it says (that's on me) just so it lasts throughout my workout. Just wish it was a little less expensive but that's what ya get for great ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Loe

customer_reviews.title: In Smoothie you can taste powder
customer_reviews.text: It's tastes like powder, ie the flavor overpowers anything else and it's gritty. Won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: L Has

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting Vanilla protein powder out there!
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste of their Vanilla flavor. Mixes great with a mixer bottle (Lao worth buying at around $10). Natural ingredients. Worth the extra cost va others, I use daily. It is a great protein supplement for active and athletic people.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but sold with a lot of dead space in the container
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a gigantic plastic jar of it, but over half of it was dead space. That’s my only complaint. Since I don’t like room being taken up that isn’t necessary it would be good if they packaged it in a smaller jar. Also, I don’t like having to push my hand through the opening to get to the bottom if I don’t need to.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a while and love it. Read the ingredients on this product and then compare it to another big name brand and you will see! This is super clean and it taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Overall Whey I Have Found
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of different types of protein, especially whey. I have always struggled to find a balance between taste and health. This product is certified by a variety of different sports companies and nutrition companies, it is healthy, and the flavor is very good. I definitely recommend this product more than any of the other types I have tried, especially given how much healthier it is compared to other, similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so freaking deliscious.
customer_reviews.text: this protein is the best protein powder I have ever tasted. buy on amazon....much cheaper than in store. also I mix mine with unsweetened vanilla almond milk. soooooo goood.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Jordan janik

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Great superior protein source that is utilized quickly by muscle and is clean, tastes good, and is needed to build/maintain muscle while on weight loss regimen. Glad my nutritionist recommended this product
customer_reviews.author: Glen H. Kleisley

customer_reviews.title: I’ve much much better chocolate flavors from other brands
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate flavor is not appealing to say the least. I’ve much much better chocolate flavors from other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why is the container so big?
customer_reviews.text: I cannot review the quality of the product yet, but I just opened my container that I ordered from Whole Foods...only about 2/3 of the container actually contains protein powder. Why have such a large container? Makes me think I'm being shorted...or the company is just wasteful. For the price I paid I would have expected that container to be full.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product !!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought and thrown away more protein powder than anyone ever should have!! This stuff is amazing. it looks different right out of the package. it is light and fluffy and tastes amazing, in that you cannot taste it at all!!!! Blends really well into other ingredients for smoothies and recipes.
customer_reviews.author: nicky iowa

customer_reviews.title: Has artificial sweetener
customer_reviews.text: Has artificial sweetener. Would have preferred one without it. I am switching to a different brand that has no artificial ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: free_radical

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, mixes easily & a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product! I have nothing negative to say. But it, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting protein powder! Perfect for busy mornings or after a workout.
customer_reviews.author: greatlakesmamma

customer_reviews.title: It dissolves quickly and tastes great. I like that it is certified clean and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this product. It dissolves quickly and tastes great. I like that it is certified clean and free from a bunch of stuff
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome taste, super good ingredients plus BCAAs and probiotics!
customer_reviews.text: Everything the body needs. Taste awesome, mix choc flavor with coconut milk and your brains will explode
customer_reviews.author: john signorelli

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor of the chocolate powder. Doesn’t taste chalky or thick. Minimal, clean ingredients. On the more pricey side, but good for a clean product. Much better price online then in the store!
customer_reviews.author: Marek White

customer_reviews.title: Strong Flavor, Awesome ingredients but it comes with $$$
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. It is definitely stronger tasting than my other protein powders used. It has awesome ingredients with no banned substances, hormones, etc. But it comes with a price. The cost is a lot compared to other protein powders. If you can afford, go for it. Hope GoL reduces the cost a bit haha.
customer_reviews.author: Aditya D

customer_reviews.title: Loving it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Is there coupan I can get ? I'm loving this product and I will be buying this as long as its gonna be available, just need to know if there's any coupon i can get ?
customer_reviews.author: sami

customer_reviews.title: My go to breakfast!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste no chalky texture like other protein powders and no "protine" after taste. I make mine with almond milk and coffee. I sometimes add mint extract for an extra kick.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: my favorite protein powder so far
customer_reviews.text: So far my favorite protein powder in terms of flavor and feeling in my gut. I like that it’s pretty thin when it’s mixed and it doesn’t clump nearly as bad as other brands. The vanilla is my go to in the AM in my oatmeal and post workout.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, mixes well
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to protein mix. Mixes well tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the after taste the first time I had this drink but after he third time it was fine and help me really good to made it to my lunch. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cherstine-Turcios

customer_reviews.title: Taste good
customer_reviews.text: This powder taste good. But the shipping took way to long for buying on amazon. I'll buy something different next time
customer_reviews.author: MATT K

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder. It tastes good and doesn’t make me feel bloated. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Giliberto

customer_reviews.title: I love this product for weight loss and appetite control
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to for adding to greek yogurt with honey, almonds and blueberries - It keeps me from being hungry all day! I even enjoy just a simple light dinner after having this for a late breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the taste
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste! Prior to buying some reviews had me worried but its probably the best I've tasted when it comes to stuff like this even though I want the benefits it provides I could really care less about the taste but its definitely a plus!
customer_reviews.author: John D Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor--Creamy and delicious
customer_reviews.text: I Love the quality of these ingredients...I will never go back to the fake flavored stuff that dont boast organic/grass fed...My body just feels the difference! Going on my third purchase
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Indahl

customer_reviews.title: Certified grass fed whey.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting whey protein and I like the nutrition facts. The ingredients are very important to me. I love garden of Life whey protein.
customer_reviews.author: A Eilerman

customer_reviews.title: Kweemuf sumyung kow
customer_reviews.text: Type 1 on the Ketotarian, Am gonna say YES!! HALF CUP OF ICE 5/8 CUP OF KROGER HEAVY WHIPPING CREAM ONE SCOOP OF THIS SEXY DIRT EQUALS - CHOCHO EYSH QUEEM CHAKE!

customer_reviews.title: Not tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Had to mix it with another protein powder in order to kill the taste!

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for pre or post workout or a meal! My trusted brand.

customer_reviews.title: my fav
customer_reviews.text: i like the garden of life brand, and i really like this particular protein powder. it mixes great in water so it's easily packed for later.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great protein and great flavor. This is now my permanent protein.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This is a great protein powder but there are similar options available for nearly half the price per ounce. Always look at the price per ounce when your shopping.

customer_reviews.title: No nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Ab average be protien powder but nothing special especially given the price

customer_reviews.title: Everything You Want, Nothing You Don't
customer_reviews.text: Has all the ingredients I want, doesn't have those I don't want, tastes great, and mixes well. I wouldn't change a thing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is the most affordable undenatured whey protein I could find to help raise my glutathione levels. I have tried both flavors and chocolate wins. The vanilla gets pretty foamy when you shake it up.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has a funny taste and company is owned by nestle now.

customer_reviews.text: Best tasting protein powder I’ve ever had. And it’s NSF certified!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I mixed with vanilla almond milk and chocolate PB2. Delicious!!!

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is such great stuff. I use it for baking too! Fantastic.

customer_reviews.text: bad taste, too frothy, doesn't mix well with liquid. won't be buying again!

customer_reviews.title: Clean and taste great!
customer_reviews.text: Clean ingredients, taste great! Best taste out of all the protein I have tried.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Grass fed whey free of the crap and fillers in most whey protein products is the way to go.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, be sure to use a blender
customer_reviews.text: When blended with milk, this is one of the best protein shakes I have had. However with water the consistency is not as smooth and it is nearly impossible to use a shaker cup as this is very clumpy without a blender

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just switched from GOL Fit and I love this product. The taste is absolutely amazing.

customer_reviews.text: Best tasting protein powder I have used. Perfect for low-carb diet with high protein and no added artificial ingredients! I purchase this product monthly.

customer_reviews.title: Right amount of sweetness and lets me go to sleep
customer_reviews.text: Out of 3 protein powders I bought, I really loved this one, it just tastes delicate and the right amount of sweetness, I was afraid of drinking it after 5pm because when I did with other powers I'd stay awake all night, I was able to rest and even though this isn't a %100 lactose free, it does not bother my stomach at all, it dissolves easy with water, nut milks and OATMEAL. I am very surprised! Sadly, it only has a few servings and if you take it twice a day it will not last you :(.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Use it daily as I work out.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and clean protein, good flavor. A little overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: andres

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheaper alternative to Beachbody recover and I found it! In fact, it’s better macro wise. Less calories, carbs, and sugar. Plus more protein. Also, it’s half the cost. I take this after my workouts and I highly recommend. Taste is good and I love having it with cold brew coffee in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Dmarie

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I use this as meal replacement for breakfast as I'm trying cut down on calories. I want to have something higher in protein and very low in fat and this is perfect. I use it with a mixture of milk and water and I add fiber to it so it's more filling and it holds me up until lunch time. I also add instant coffee to it and I really like it. It's like a vanilla flavored coffee shake. It's working well for me for what I use it. I have both this one and the chocolate one and alternate. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: This is the best tasting protein I’ve ever tried
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting protein I’ve ever tried. I had previously had issues finding someone that was whey but not full of sucralose and other added garbage. Then I found this! It’s creamy, mixes perfectly. It’s just really damn tasty!!! I look forward to it everyday and honestly helps curb my chocolate cravings. I couldn’t afford it consistently (trying thrive markets whey next) but will def buy when I can!!!
customer_reviews.author: amy saavedra

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Easily blends in a shaker bottle with milk, unlike all other protein powders I've tried. Flavor is great, and clean ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, love the ingredients! Garden of life always keeps their products clean and natural! Left me feeling really good after my workout today, will definitely buy again 😌
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, it's a little on the pricey side but I'm willing to pay extra for better quality ingredients. So many protein powders have a lot of crap in them, Plus grass fed is the way to go...
customer_reviews.author: Heather Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Taste isn’t for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Second bottle. Love the fact that it is zero carbs etc but the taste ugh! I had to add cinnamon to get over the flavor and my mouth frothy fromthe milky whey after taste. Mental toughness everytime I tried drinking it and makes me nauseous. The second bottle was smaller amt. I’d recommend to drink it with ice less nasty effects
customer_reviews.author: J. T

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This stuff gave me huge cramps, constipation, and gas. My shakes tasted really chalky. I wish I would have returned the product while I could. I tried to give it a chance but very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: GymFan

customer_reviews.title: This whey is quality but the vanilla flavor tastes artificial and overly sweet. I would consider purchasing again if they will ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried this out after getting turned onto Garden of Life's plant and vegan based powders. This whey is quality but the vanilla flavor tastes artificial and overly sweet. I would consider purchasing again if they will offer an unflavored version.
customer_reviews.author: dm4220

customer_reviews.title: Taste is awful. Doesn't mix well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I like another products of there's and wanted to try to be healthier in regards to the supplements I used. I've tried a lot of protein powders and this one was awful unfortunately. I got the chocolate flavor. It tastes like melted plastic. It is by far the worst protein I've ever used in regards to mixing. It clumps up worse than anything I've tried and I bet it won't even mix well in a blender. I will however continue to purchase their other vegan protein they make. It has a subtle taste and mixes well.
customer_reviews.author: ryan landau

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, rich chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: Good taste, mixes easily. Rich chocolate flavor versus some of the others I have tried. I usually order Mercola whey and this was a good substitute. I understand that powder settles after filling but it is really a shame to receive the container half empty and waste so much plastic. Seems like GOL should switch to a more ecological bag. Or you could just buy two, combine and toss. :)
customer_reviews.author: Bradford G.

product_meta.title: Garden of Life Sport Certified Grass Fed Clean Whey Protein Isolate, Vanilla, 22.57 Ounce
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:VanillaCertified Grass Fed Whey is designed to refuel and repair muscles. Intensive training and exercise breaks down muscle tissue and then the body repairs and rebuilds to make them stronger. Our premium quality, clean Certified Grass Fed Whey is not only free of hormones and antibiotics, but we are also very proud to have the ONLY Non- GMO Project Verified Whey. Due to these third-party certifications, Certified Grass Fed Whey is also NSF Certified for Sport and Informed-Choice for Sport Certified. You can rest assured there are no athletic banned substances in this clean whey protein.For Garden of Life to launch an animal protein, the entire system had to be different from other “so-called grass fed” protein. We needed a holistic approach to our protein that started at the farm and traced every metric straight through to the tub. Although many whey protein products may call themselves “grass fed,” our research showed this wasn’t truly the case. Almost all dairy farms still used animal feed full of soy, corn and GMOs. Why? Typically, there are too many cows to feed year-round on grass. Our search ultimately ended in Ireland with a coop of 4,800 generational family farmers whose herds feed only in green pastures.
feature_bullets: CLEAN WHEY PROTEIN: Truly Grass Fed Certified, Non-GMO Project Verified, Gluten free, Soy free, NSF Certified for Sport and Informed-Choice for Sport Certified, with No added hormones, No antibiotics, No added sugars
POST WORKOUT RECOVERY: Our Garden of Life Sports Whey Protein Isolate helps you refuels & repair muscles after a hard workout with 24g Grass Fed Whey, 4g Glutamine and over 6g BCAA amino acids

IMMUNE SYSTEM SUPPORT: This protein shake supports your immune system during a taxing training regimen or dieting cycle ; rBST, rBGH and antibiotic free, un-denatured, cold-processed, micro-filtered, Non-GMO Project Verified and BSE free
VANILLA PROTEIN POWDER: Our whey isolate protein powder helps reduce recovery time after a workout, helping you get back to training faster
PROTEIN FOR A LEAN BODY: This protein powder for men and women can be used within an hour after a workout or throughout the day to combat hunger and improve satiety

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
